Name: Zoning, Domino Site B, Brooklyn (N 250275 ZRK).
Title: Application number N 250275 ZRK (Domino Site B) submitted by Domino A Partners LLC and Domino B Partners LLC, pursuant to Section 201 of the New York City Charter, for an amendment of the Zoning Resolution of the City of New York, amending Article VII, Chapter 4 (Special Permits by the City Planning Commission) to modify the applicability of ZR Section 23-23 and related modifications, Borough of Brooklyn, Community District 1, Council District 33.

History.Description: This Land Use Application was Filed by Council
